snippet: A federal grand jury on Tuesday indicted a Kansas City man on three new charges for his alleged attempt last month to fire-bomb the local office of Missouri U.S. Democratic Representative Emanuel Cleaver, prosecutors said....

headline.print_headline: Attempted Fire-Bombing of Missouri Federal Office Brings New Charges
headline.main: Attempted Fire-Bombing of Missouri Federal Office Brings New Charges

lead_paragraph: A federal grand jury on Tuesday indicted a Kansas City man on three new charges for his alleged attempt last month to fire-bomb the local office of Missouri U.S. Democratic Representative Emanuel Cleaver, prosecutors said.
